section.heading: Authority and responsibility of commissioner regarding hospital mortgages

content.p:
ยง 2883. Authority and responsibility of commissioner regarding
hospital mortgages. For the purposes of this article, only the
provisions of sections twenty-eight hundred seventy, twenty-eight
hundred seventy-one, twenty-eight hundred seventy-two, twenty-eight
hundred seventy-three, twenty-eight hundred seventy-four, twenty-eight
hundred seventy-five, twenty-eight hundred seventy-seven, subdivision
one of section twenty-eight hundred seventy-eight, twenty-eight hundred
eighty, twenty-eight hundred eighty-one and twenty-eight hundred
eighty-two shall apply to loans made pursuant to this article after
April first, nineteen hundred eighty-one.
